member.name: T:Microsoft.Kinect.Xaml.Controls.IKinectControl
member.summary: The interface implemented by Kinect controls.

member.summary: Creates a IKinectController object with the specified input model and Kinect region.
member.param: The input model.
The Kinect region.

member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether the control receives manipulation gestures.

member.summary: The interface implemented by a Kinect controller.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Kinect.Xaml.Controls.KinectRegion

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the KinectRegion class.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the cursor is visible.
member.param: The pointer ID associated with the cursor.

A boolean value indicating whether the cursor is visible.

A boolean value indicating whether the control is a press target.

member.summary: Instructs the region to track one body/hand pair that is dynamically determined by the system as currently engaged.

member.summary: Instructs the region to track two body/hand pairs that are specified by the application as currently engaged.
